item.title: Links
item.description: Do we have anything in common ? https://www.recurse.com/ & https://theexperience.co/ Thinking Machines by Danny Hillis Jeff Dean and Sanjay Ghemawat(Map Reduce and other systems) Leslie Lamport Claude Shannon - The mathematical theory of communication Hal Abelson, Gerald Sussman - SICP Why is Gravity unlike other forces

item.title: Livecoding
item.description: What is Livecoding ? Link There are several tools you can use for livecoding https://sonic-pi.net/ https://tidalcycles.org/ For more check out the Awesome Repo
